description: This file is a C++ source implementation for the WIFIAgent class. It includes method definitions for initializing, starting, stopping, getting and setting WiFi parameters, managing table objects, attributes, health checks, and session IDs. It also contains external C linkage for API wrappers and functions to create and destroy the object.

classes.name: WIFIAgent
classes.description: Class implementing WiFi agent functionalities such as initialization, start/stop, parameter get/set, attribute management, and health checks.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the WiFi agent and registers necessary components.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up pre-requisites necessary before running tests, including WiFi agent registration.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets or cleans up pre-requisites after tests.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Start(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Starts the WiFi agent by invoking ssp_register.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value through ssp_getParameterValue.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Set(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value via ssp_setParameterValue and applies settings if needed.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_SetMultiple(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets multiple parameters at once and applies settings accordingly.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Set_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs set and get validation for parameters.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_GetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves attribute information for a given parameter.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_SetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets attribute information for a parameter.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_GetNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Gets parameter names within a specified component path.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_AddObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds a new row to a table object.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_DelObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Deletes a row from a table object.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_SetCommit(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Commits changes made to a table object.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_GetHealth(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Checks the health status of a component.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_SetSessionId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a session ID with specified priority and override options.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Stop(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Stops the WiFi agent.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Get_LargeValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves large parameter data.

methods.name: void WIFIAgent_Set_LargeValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets large parameter data.

methods.name: WIFIAgent * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void DestroyObject(WIFIAgent * stubobj)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: unavailable
